data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module most closely resembles enum in interface and usage. The
    difference is that you can inherit fields from another class. The
    main usage is in objects that consist of a reference to an array. So
    in that way it is similar in purpose to fields.pm, and similar in
    functionality and usage to enum.pm, aside from the ability to extend
    another class. Hence, enum::fields.
